languages.text: "Эксплоратор — универсальный инструмент познания. Пока триумф Омниссии не достигнут, ему всегда найдется применение". {n}Паскаль с гордостью прикасается к знаку Эксплоратора мехадендритом.{/n}

"An Explorator is an all-purpose tool for gaining knowledge. Until the Omnissiah's triumph is achieved, there will always be a use for them." {n}Pasqal proudly touches his Explorator sign with a mechadendrite.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Эксплоратор — универсальный инструмент познания. Пока триумф Омниссии не достигнут, ему всегда найдется применение". {n}Паскаль с гордостью прикасается к знаку Эксплоратора мехадендритом.{/n}

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "An Explorator is an all-purpose tool for gaining knowledge. Until the Omnissiah's triumph is achieved, there will always be a use for them." {n}Pasqal proudly touches his Explorator sign with a mechadendrite.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “开拓者是一种万用工具，他们唯一的目标就是获取知识。在欧姆尼塞亚获得胜利之前，他们始终都会有用武之地。”{n}帕斯卡用他的机械触须自豪地触摸着他的开拓者印记。{/n}
languages.original_text: "An Explorator is an all-purpose tool for gaining knowledge. Until the Omnissiah's triumph is achieved, there will always be a use for them." {n}Pasqal proudly touches his Explorator sign with a mechadendrite.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “开拓者是一种万用工具，他们唯一的目标就是获取知识。在欧姆尼塞亚获得胜利之前，他们始终都会有用武之地。”{n}帕斯卡用他的机械触须自豪地触摸着他的开拓者印记。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Un explorador es una herramienta multiusos para la adquisición de conocimiento. Hasta que se produzca el triunfo del Omnissiah, siempre servirá de algo». {n}Pasqal, orgulloso, se toca el símbolo de explorador con una mecadendrita.{/n}
languages.original_text: "An Explorator is an all-purpose tool for gaining knowledge. Until the Omnissiah's triumph is achieved, there will always be a use for them." {n}Pasqal proudly touches his Explorator sign with a mechadendrite.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Un explorador es una herramienta multiusos para la adquisición de conocimiento. Hasta que se produzca el triunfo del Omnissiah, siempre servirá de algo». {n}Pasqal, orgulloso, se toca el símbolo de explorador con una mecadendrita.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「探索艦隊は知識を得るための万能の道具だ。万機神の勝利が達成されるまでは、彼らは常に活用されるのだ」{n}パスカルは誇らしげに機械触手で探索艦隊の印に触れる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "An Explorator is an all-purpose tool for gaining knowledge. Until the Omnissiah's triumph is achieved, there will always be a use for them." {n}Pasqal proudly touches his Explorator sign with a mechadendrite.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「探索艦隊は知識を得るための万能の道具だ。万機神の勝利が達成されるまでは、彼らは常に活用されるのだ」{n}パスカルは誇らしげに機械触手で探索艦隊の印に触れる。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Exploratoren sind Mehrzweckwerkzeuge zur Erlangung von Wissen. Bis der Triumph des Omnissiah erreicht ist, wird es immer eine Verwendung für sie geben." {n}Pasqal berührt mit einem Mechadendriten stolz sein Explorator-Abzeichen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "An Explorator is an all-purpose tool for gaining knowledge. Until the Omnissiah's triumph is achieved, there will always be a use for them." {n}Pasqal proudly touches his Explorator sign with a mechadendrite.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Exploratoren sind Mehrzweckwerkzeuge zur Erlangung von Wissen. Bis der Triumph des Omnissiah erreicht ist, wird es immer eine Verwendung für sie geben." {n}Pasqal berührt mit einem Mechadendriten stolz sein Explorator-Abzeichen.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Un explorator est un outil multifonction permettant d'acquérir des connaissances. Il aura toujours une utilité, jusqu'à ce que le triomphe de l'Omnimessie soit total. » {n}De l'une de ses mécadendrites, Pasqal touche fièrement son insigne d'explorator.{/n}
languages.original_text: "An Explorator is an all-purpose tool for gaining knowledge. Until the Omnissiah's triumph is achieved, there will always be a use for them." {n}Pasqal proudly touches his Explorator sign with a mechadendrite.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Un explorator est un outil multifonction permettant d'acquérir des connaissances. Il aura toujours une utilité, jusqu'à ce que le triomphe de l'Omnimessie soit total. » {n}De l'une de ses mécadendrites, Pasqal touche fièrement son insigne d'explorator.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "An Explorator is an all-purpose tool for gaining knowledge. Until the Omnissiah's triumph is achieved, there will always be a use for them." {n}Pasqal proudly touches his Explorator sign with a mechadendrite.{/n}

languages.text: "Keşiftörler, irfan edinme yolunda her türlü gereksinimi karşılayabilen birer araçtır. Hermesih muzaffer olana dek onlara her daim ihtiyaç olacaktır." {n}Pasqal, bir mekadentritiyle Keşiftör işaretine gururla dokunuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "An Explorator is an all-purpose tool for gaining knowledge. Until the Omnissiah's triumph is achieved, there will always be a use for them." {n}Pasqal proudly touches his Explorator sign with a mechadendrite.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bir Keşiftör irfan kazanma yolunda her türlü gereksinimi karşılayabilen bir araçtır. Hermesih muzaffer olana dek onlara her daim ihtiyaç olacaktır." {n}Pasqal mekadentritlerinin biriyle Keşiftör işaretine gururla dokunuyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
